mission_paragraph: Guhereka urubyiruko rutarimo akazi, cyane cyane abarangije amashuri y'itangazamakuru, ubumenyi bwo kuvuga inkuru mu buryo bw'ikoranabuhanga, mu gihe tunatanga serivisi za PR ku giciro cyoroheje ku bucuruzi bw'ibanze, bikomeza urusobe rw'itangazamakuru n'ubukungu bwaho.
vision_paragraph: Umuryango aho inkuru z'ukuri z'ibanze ziyobora inkuru z'isi yose, aho urubyiruko rukura mu mirimo y'itumanaho rishingiye ku ikoranabuhanga, n'aho ubucuruzi bukoresha inkuru mu gukurura ishoramari n'iterambere.
empowerment_value_desc: Twizera guha abakomoka ibikoresho byo kwishushanyiriza inkuru n'imishinga yabo.
innovation_value_desc: Twakira ikoranabuhanga rishya n'inzira nshya z'itumanaho.
collaboration_value_desc: Dukomeza ubufatanye hagati y'urubyiruko, ubucuruzi, n'itangazamakuru kugira ngo tugere ku mpinduka rusange.
sustainability_value_desc: Twubaka ubumenyi burambye kandi tugatanga serivisi zigira uruhare mu iterambere ry'ubukungu rirambye.
train_youth_desc: Dutanga imyitozo ngiro mu itangazamakuru rishingiye ku ikoranabuhanga, iremwa ry'ibirimo, imicungire y'imbuga nkoranyambaga, na za gahunda za PR.
provide_pr_desc: Gutanga serivisi za PR zinoze, zidahenze ku masosiyete mato n'ayaciriritse (SME) n'imiryango y'ibanze, bibafasha kugera ku bantu benshi no gukurura ishoramari.
bridge_gap_desc: Guhuza urubyiruko rwatojwe n'amahirwe y'akazi mu itangazamakuru n'itumanaho, bigabanya ubushomeri.
strengthen_media_desc: Gutanga umusanzu mu mikorere y'itangazamakuru ry'ibanze rihuriweho kandi ritandukanye mu guteza imbere ibirimo n'impano z'ibanze.
newsletter_subscribe_text: Iyandikishe kuri newsletter yacu kugirango ubashe kubona amakuru agezweho!
